attributes.action: instruct MPs to pay back all expenses relating to 2nd homes if the expenses were not directly for carrying out the duties of an MP.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Claiming for work done to upgrade 2nd homes then "flipping" them is an absolute disgrace. I don't care if it's "within the rules", the spirit of the Green Book has been broken.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
